Tournament Time



Game Reviews: In Season, and Tournament!
Well, here it goes. This is going to be some crazy stuff but the winner will be the winner and thats all that matters. As stated on the last page, we are starting each game within 5 minutes of the appointed time so be there. Here are the games which you can follow in relation to the chart down below.

CHAMPIONSHIP GAME: TBA in Fall, SEXY BITCHES FC vs. MRS. WOLF IS HOT!
